Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to refer our deepest concern and doubt on the meritorious and conduct of Solicitor Junius HO Kwan-yiu, Member of Hong Kong Law Society.

It is proved by different media and news report that, in the late night of 21st July, 2019, there appeared a large coup of gangsters, under the protection by the bias Hong Kong Police, attacked on the innocent protestors against The Extradition Law to China in Yuen Long District. While those gangsters bet the protestors with those powerful and killing weapons recklessly, it is discovered that Solicitor Ho appeared at the scene and showed his support to this unlawful and violent action. Not only did he appeared himself, but he also expressed his opinion, that he would allow those gangs to “kill” the peaceful protestors in their own will, until they are all cleared. What’s more, in his earlier videos can we found that he persuaded the citizens to launch a mass killing campaign on those anti-government citizens. This was particularly ridiculous, especially from the mouth of a Lawyer and even a Legislative Council Member.

It is often believed that being a practitioner in law, he or she should particularly understand the importance of justice and also the rule of law, because they are always be regarded as the protector of rule of law in Hong Kong, our beloved home. However, inside this incident cannot we see his action to defend the justice. Instead, he chose to encourage such violence action, which harmed the personal safety and human rights of Hong Kong citizens. His action, even more, deeply harmed the security in Hong Kong, which greatly undermined the rule of law and the reputation of Hong Kong.

In view of this, may I request your emphasis in this case. We wish that the Law Society of Hong Kong can take actions to address his personal conduct and meritorious of the Law Practitioners, such as calling for a Disciplinary Hearing. We would also request for your voicing out to help defend our rule of law and our justice.

May we request your assistance to protect our home, by joining us in the same front. May God bless Hong Kong, our Bonnie home.


Yours sincerely,
A devastated Hong Kong citizens who love their homeland

Email address as follows:
sg@hklawsoc.org.hk
